1370: Lardies moved to Breestraat.A.17 after marriage.
Got married to Gerburgis at age 37 in 1370.
Had a son with Gerburgis, Lardies, at age 37.
1372: Had a daughter with Gerburgis, Scilla, at age 39.
1373: Had a son with Gerburgis, Dolf, at age 40.
1374: Had a daughter with Gerburgis, Ricmoden, at age 41.
1375: Had a daughter with Gerburgis, Sybillia, at age 42.
1377: Had a son with Gerburgis, Dilane, at age 44.
1378: Became caretaker of Lardies, Scilla, Dolf, Ricmoden, Sybillia, Dilane at age 46.
1379: Lost son Lardies when Lardies was 10 years old.
